attributes.action: Put a Price cap on Motor Vehicle insurance prices
attributes.additional_details: as a young person I am unable to afford insurance which means I cannot get a job locally because I live in a rural area with very limited public transport
attributes.background: put a maximum cap on Motor Vehicle insurance prices

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703058
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709463
